title: Smoke On The Water
lyrics:
[intro]  x2
(Em)  (G)  (A-hold) | (Em)  (G)  (Bb - A)
(Em)  (G)  (A-hold) | (G)  (Em-Em)
 
We (Em)all came out to Montreux
(Em) On the (D)Lake Ge(Em)neva shoreline
(Em) To make records with a mobile
(Em) We didn't (D)have much time (Em)
(Em) But Frank Zappa and the Mothers
Were (Em)at the best (D)place around (Em)
(Em) But some stupid with a flare gun
(Em)Burned the place (D)to the ground (Em)
 
[chorus]
(A)Smoke... on the (F)water (Em) and fire in the sky
(A)Smoke... on the (F)water
 
[interlude]  x2
(Em)  (G)  (A-hold) | (Em)  (G)  (Bb - A)
(Em)  (G)  (A-hold) | (G)  (Em-Em)
 
(Em) They burned down the gambling house
It (Em)died with an (D)awful sound (Em)
(Em) Funky Claude was running in and out
(Em) (D) Pulling (Em)kids down to ground
(Em) When it all was over
We (Em)had to find an(D)other place (Em)
(Em) But Swiss time was running out
It (Em)seemed that we would (D)lose the race (Em)
 
[chorus]
(A)Smoke... on the (F)water (Em) and fire in the sky
(A)Smoke... on the (F)water
 
[interlude]  x2
(Em)  (G)  (A-hold) | (Em)  (G)  (Bb - A)
(Em)  (G)  (A-hold) | (G)  (Em-Em)
 
(Em) We ended up at the Grand Hotel
(Em) It was (D)empty (Em)cold and bare
But with the (Em)Rolling truck Stones thing just outside
(Em) (D) Making our (Em)music there
With a (Em)few red lights, a few old beds
(Em) We made a (D)place to sweat (Em)
(Em) No matter what... we get out of this
(Em) I know (D) I know we'll (Em)never forget
 
[chorus]
(A)Smoke... on the (F)water (Em) and fire in the sky
(A)Smoke... on the (F)water
 
[interlude]  x2
(Em)  (G)  (A-hold) | (Em)  (G)  (Bb - A)
(Em)  (G)  (A-hold) | (G)  (Em-Em)
[end]
